statements: UPDATE logistics_providers SET provider_location='New York' WHERE provider_name='XYZ Logistics';

UPDATE logistics_providers SET provider_location = 'New York', contact_email = 'info@example.com' WHERE provider_id = 1

UPDATE third_party_logistics_providers SET provider_contact_person = 'John Doe' WHERE provider_id = 1;
UPDATE shipment_orders SET order_details = 'New order details', order_date = '2022-01-31' WHERE order_id = 5;
UPDATE third_party_logistics_providers SET provider_email = 'updated_email@example.com', provider_phone_number = '+1-123-456-7890' WHERE provider_id = 1;
UPDATE shipment_orders SET order_details = 'Updated Order Details', order_date = '2022-12-31', provider_id = 2 WHERE order_id = 5;
UPDATE logistics_providers SET provider_name = 'New Provider Name' WHERE provider_id = 1;
UPDATE order_shipments SET shipment_status = 'Shipped' WHERE shipment_id = 3;
UPDATE logistics_providers SET provider_contact = 'John Doe', provider_address = '123 Main St' WHERE provider_id = 1;
UPDATE order_shipments SET shipment_status = 'Shipped' WHERE order_id = 100 AND provider_id = 2;
UPDATE logistics_providers SET contact_person = 'John Doe' WHERE provider_id = 1;
UPDATE shipment_details SET quantity = 10, weight = 5.5 WHERE shipment_id = 1001;

UPDATE shipments SET status = 'Delivered' WHERE shipment_id = 1001;

UPDATE logistics_orders SET status='Delivered', delivery_date='2022-01-31' WHERE order_id=1001;

UPDATE logistics_orders SET order_date = '2022-09-15', status = 'Shipped' WHERE order_id = 1001;
